short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to remove faces within images for safety and privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to automatically remove faces from images such as protest pictures or crowd photos, ensuring safety and anonymity. It also allows you to manually add faces that may not have been caught by the machine learning engine. Click and drag to manually add faces. You can then download the image, free of metadata.
